feed.title: Tag: gold | Edmonds Commerce Dev Blog

entry.title: Magento Partners UK - Silver Partners
entry.content:
Magento have a partner programme which agencies such as ourselves can register with to become partners.

Edmonds Commerce are Silver Magento Partners. This means that we specialise in both Magento Community and Magento Enterprise projects for clients ranging from SME to PLC level.

If you would like to discuss your Magento requirements with a Magento Partner agency then get in touch with Edmonds Commerce today.

You can see the full details of the Magento Partner Program here.

If you have a Magento project that requires highly skilled and experienced Zend Certified Engineers (an actual PHP qualification that assures of skill in the PHP programming language itself that Magento is written in) then do get in touch today.
